original_text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
korean_text: 너희 마음의 눈을 밝히사 그의 부르심의 소망이 무엇이며 성도 안에서 그 기업의 영광의 풍성함이 무엇이며

sentences.original_text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened
what is the hope of his calling
and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance
